title: Rxn energy profile - heat flow if 1 mol XY2 reacts

content.prompt: Which of the following best describes the flow of heat when 1.0 mol of XY2 decomposes?

choices.label: 50 kJ of heat is transferred to the surroundings.
50 kJ of heat is transferred from the surroundings.
100 kJ of heat is transferred to the surroundings.
100 kJ of heat is transferred from the surroundings.

skill.text: 4.A: Predict and/or explain chemical properties or phenomena (e.g., of atoms or molecules) using given chemical theories, models, and representations.
